```{r}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
TPM <- openxlsx::read.xlsx("Input/CHO96.countData.xlsx", sheet="TPM", rowNames=T) %>%
  tibble::rownames_to_column(var="gene")
CHOmap <- fread("../ConversionTable/geneInfo_cho_simple.tsv")
```

```{r}
TPM.entrez <- left_join(TPM, select(CHOmap, c("GeneID", "Symbol")), by=c("gene"="Symbol")) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  select(-gene) %>%
  select(GeneID, everything())
```

```{r}
fwrite(TPM.entrez, "Input/TPM_entrez.csv")
```
